description.value: Harvested from the Behir's mouth, this light leathery sac contains caustic chemicals that continually crackle and pop. The sac is prized by alchemists, armorers and weaponsmiths. Use: The lightning sack can be thrown up to a range of 20 feet. If thrown, the sack explodes on impact, dealing 4d10 lightning damage to all creatures in a 10 foot radius, or half that on a successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.
